oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Practical vaccination strategies for beef cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Givens, M. Daniel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cattle
beef
vaccine
IBR
BVDV
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The identification and adherence to underlying principles for the development of practical vaccination protocols for beef cattle operations can lead to clear, prudent and justified recom足mendations to producers. Consideration of results from clinical trials should clearly inform decision-making in the formation of these recommendations. In some situations, the determina足tion of how to prioritize and apply underlying principles will re足quire a thoughtful, iterative process between the veterinarian and the producer. The result of the process should lead to the development of an optimal, tailored protocol and a close profes足sional relationship between the veterinarian and the producer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 59 (2025): 2025 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 29-31
